CHOOSE A PLAN. TRAIN EVERY WEEK.

MEMBERSHIP PLANS

A Chess Subscription Built for Progress

Choose a monthly or yearly chess membership and train with real coaches in live online chess lessons. Our plans fit both kids and adults — from first moves to confident, competitive play.

Each package includes structured training (tactics, strategy, openings, endgames) plus feedback and game analysis. Start with a trial class, then follow a clear path designed to improve your rating and decision-making.

SMALL GROUP CHESS CLASSES

Weekly small group lessons matched by level — perfect for chess for kids and chess for adults.

MONTHLY OR YEARLY MEMBERSHIP

Pick a flexible monthly subscription or save with a yearly plan. Upgrade your package anytime.

STRUCTURED TRAINING PROGRAM

Tactics, openings, endgames, and practical strategy with puzzles, homework, and coach feedback.

TOURNAMENT & LEAGUE SUPPORT

Join friendly arenas and league events, get tournament prep, and track progress with guided game reviews.

We’re building the coaching side of the platform:
